name: Water You Doing? (Jason Warrick)
description:
Made as part of the GameDev.tv beginner Unity 3D course

Controls:

  • Left/Right Arrows - Lean Left/Right
  • Space - Thrust
  • Escape - Quit

Objective:

Land on the illuminated landing pad!

Notes:

Minor lighting bugs in WebGL version, download for better performance

Full devlog here!
